Name: STERN
About the game: Anarchy and lawlessness flourish in the city, and at the same time, due to the explosion of a chemical plant, all residents inhabiting the city are turning into unknown creatures and creatures that crave human flesh. No more rules, no more laws! EXPLORE - The very world is at your fingertips as you fight for survival, fortune, and glory! BOSSES - Kill dangerous creatures to get a unique loot! PROGRESS - Ð¡hoose to seek out ever-greater foe's to test your mettle in combat! FISHING - Catch many different types of creatures, and complete tasks from the robot fisherman! CURSE - Go through random events, and get rewarded! COMMUNICATE - Talk to the survivors, and learn the history of this world! YOUR DRONE - Manage your drone! [Monitor its - name | health | energy | level | experience | modules | items] BUFFS/DEBUFFS - Turning into an animal, blindness, infection, drunkenness, and more! COMBAT - Find unique creatures to fight and capture unique loot, effects and progression! CRAFT - Create a variety of different items and weapons! DEPTHS - Get down deep into cavernous expanses in search of treasure! Let's go, traveler! HUGE ARSENAL - From a homing rocket launcher to a cannon that turns enemies into pigs! The game was developed by one person. But I want to thank all those who gave and still give feedback and advice. This is a valuable experience.
